A method that populates a string array of all users that are capable of being a subprogram chair.

Method that returns all of the available reviewers for a given paper.
getCurrentConference() - Method in class controller.Controller
Returns the conference that is being looked at by the user.
getCurrentPaper() - Method in class controller.Controller
Returns the current paper of the controller.
getCurrentUsername() - Method in class controller.Controller
Returns the username of the current person logged in.
getFullName(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Returns the full name of the individual when the username is passed in.
getMyConferences(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Returns an array of Conference objects that the user that is passed in belongs to.
getMyPapers(Conference, String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Returns an array of Papers that are in the conference passed in and are associated with the user.
getPaperAuthor(Conference, String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Used by an administrative user to see the author of the paper that they are examining.
getPaperFilePath(Conference, String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Returns the text of the paper that is passed in.
getPaperID(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Gets the paperID associated with the name of the paper.
getPaperRecommendationNumericalValuefinal(Conference, String) - Method in class controller.Controller

Retrieves the SubPC's recommendation for a paper from the database given a conference and a paper within that conference.
getPaperRecommendationSubPCName(Conference, String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Retrieves the SubProgramChair's username from the recommendation of the paper passed in from the conference passed in.
getRelationToPaper(Conference, String, String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Returns the relation of the person passed in with the paper passed in.
